resources.string: The Sorcerer/Philosopher Stone was guarded by 7 things.
Dumbledore was responsible for the trio finding out about the stone
In the book, Petunia Dursley is described as having blonde hair.
Hagrid told Harry that he was a wizard on his 10th birthday.
Vernon Dursley works for a mask making company.
Professor McGonagall can turn into a cat without a design around her eyes.
Harry is the Seeker for the Quidditch team.
Hagrid gives Harry an owl for his 11th birthday.
Harry first met draco at school.
Professor Snape turned out to be the bad guy.
Fluffy the three - headed dog, devils snare, flying keys, troll, wizards chess, potions logic, and the mirror.
In the movie she had brown hair
He got it as his birthday present so he could have a pet at hogwarts.
Harry bought his school robes in Madame Malkins.
